issue.title: Compilation error on Windows due to not found UCRT headers

content.raw:
> And if you \(just temporarily\) comment out the `include_directories(${WINDOWS_KITS_UCRT_INCLUDE})` line, would compilation succeed?

Yes, that is working. However, I  am currently compiling with `BUILD_TESTING` set to `OFF`, so the tests are not compiling, and it is possible that if I try to compile them I will get the compilation problem you were  experiencing .
content.html:
And if you (just temporarily) comment out the include_directories(${WINDOWS_KITS_UCRT_INCLUDE}) line, would compilation succeed?

Yes, that is working. However, I am currently compiling with BUILD_TESTING set to OFF, so the tests are not compiling, and it is possible that if I try to compile them I will get the compilation problem you were experiencing .
